articles.title: 'Why is TikTok getting banned in US?' Netizens wonder, as House passes bill - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The US House of Representatives recently passed a bill that could see TikTok get banned in America
articles.content: The US House of Representatives recently passed a bill that could see TikTok get banned in America. The bill gives ByteDance, the apps Chinese parent company, six months to sell its controlling stake… [+2595 chars]
